Name: helloworld
Desc: Helloworld is our first Go program.

Name: dup1
Desc: Dup1 prints the text of each line that appears more than once in the standard input, preceded by its count.

Name: dup2
Desc: Dup2 prints the count and text of lines that appear more than once in the input.  It reads from stdin or from a list of named files.

Name: dup3
Desc: Dup3 prints the count and text of lines that appear more than once in the named input files.

Name: lissajous
Desc: Lissajous generates GIF animations of random Lissajous figures.

Name: fetch
Desc: Fetch prints the content found at each specified URL.

Name: fetchall
Desc: Fetchall fetches URLs in parallel and reports their times and sizes.

Name: server2
Desc: Server2 is a minimal "echo" and counter server.

Name: server3
Desc: Server3 is an "echo" server that displays request parameters.
